body.name: ZealSound Gaming Microphone Kit,Podcast Condenser USB Mic with Boom Arm,Supercardioid Microphone with Mute Button,Echo Volume Gain Knob,Adjust Monitor for Phone PC Computer Tablet Streaming Recording

features: 【Plug and Play】With its plug-and-play design, this USB Microphone is compatible with a wide range of devices, including MacBook, PS4/5, Windows Mac OS PC Computer Laptop, iPhone, iPad, Tablet, Type C devices, and Android smartphones. No drivers are required, so you can start recording with this condenser microphone right out of the box.

【Audio Clarity Recording】 Equipped with an intelligent noise reduction chipset and rugged construction, this USB condenser microphone offers a wide frequency response and handles high SPLs with ease. The cardioid pattern is more sensitive and can reject unwanted off-axis noise, delivering vocal originality and intelligibility during your live streaming, gaming, ASMR, and video recording sessions.

【Durable Arm Set】With the K66's durable arm set, you'll have all the tools you need to capture your voice with precision. The versatile metal construction broadcast suspension boom scissor arm offers 30.8 inches of horizontal and vertical distance and 360° full rotation, ensuring that you can easily adjust it to get the best pickup. The desk clamp easily clips onto any desk up to 1.8 inches thick, providing a stable platform for your microphone.

【Professional Onboard Audio Control】This Podcast Microphone also features professional onboard audio control. The sensitive mic gain, ECHO knob adjustment, volume knob, and monitor volume allow you to adjust the appropriate volume at will, making recording sound more comfortable. The quick mute functionality is also very handy for users, with a built-in LED light to indicate the working status. And with the gaming microphone's 3.5mm headphone output, you'll get direct, latency-free monitoring.

【Live Monitoring】This podcast microphone features a 3.5mm headphone interface that allows for direct and latency-free monitoring. It's especially useful for video creators who want to ensure they're not cutting off or experiencing excessive noise. Adjust the desired monitoring level using the volume control, whether you're gaming, recording content for TikTok, YouTube, Zoom, or Facebook live streams. With this microphone, you can achieve an optimal volume level.

【Podcast Equipment Bundle】With the K66 microphone kit and podcast equipment bundle, you'll never spend more for accessories. You'll receive 1 x heavy-duty professional K66 recording microphone; 1 x 70.87-inch USB Audio cable; 1 x Type C adapter for the newest MacBook and all other Type C devices (phone, tablets, and PC); 1 x USB Adapter for iPhone and iPad; 1 x Microphone foam windscreen; 1 x Mic clamp (max 1.8 inches); 1 x Mic arm; 1 x User manual; 1 x All backed by our free technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Strong Compatibility with PC, Computer, Laptop, iPhone, Smartphone, iPad, PS 4&5. (TYPE-C ADAPTER & USB ADAPTER FOR IPHONE INCLUDE)

K66 Microphone Equipment Bundle Equipped with Mic Boom Arm The Durable and Sturdy ARM STAND broadcast suspension boom scissor arm provides exceptional tools for capturing your voice in a podcast or voiceover. Onboard Audio Control The microphone features a mute, microphone volume, echo, and monitor volume control, adjustable volume ensures monitoring quality and convenience. Real-Time Monitor Easily monitor your recordings by connecting headphones and use the gain knob to adjust the monitor volume for optimal sound quality. Noise Cancel Mode The noise-canceling function is initially off. Press and hold the mute button until it turns blue to activate noise cancel.

Seamless Compatibility: Connect All Your Devices with Ease This microphone comes with a USB adapter for use with iPhone and iPad Pro (iPhone 5 onwards and fourth-generation iPad onwards), as well as a Type-C adapter for use with all Type-C devices. And It is compatible with PS4, PS4 Pro, PS5, desktop computers, and laptops.

A microphone for all of your needs The noise-canceling function is initially disabled. To activate advanced noise cancellation, press and hold the mute button until it turns blue. Content creators, musicians, journalists, gamers, and anyone else in need of a noise-free recording environment can activate this feature.
ALL-IN-ONE Microphone Kit You'll never need to spend extra on accessories with this K66 microphone bundle.

What is the pickup pattern of this microphone? Top-addressed cardioid pickup, you will need to position it with the top of the microphone facing towards the sound source when using it. Make sure to speak directly into the top of the microphone, as this will provide the best sound quality. Why does it not work with my Android phone but function well with my iPhone 15? Please ensure that your Android device supports OTG and verify that it's enabled in the settings before use. (Search for "OTG" in the settings and enable it.) Is the mic compatible with the Mac book? The mic is compatible with Macbook and doesn't require any additional drivers. Make sure to check your Mac settings and ensure that the mic is recognized as an input source. As an ASMR artist, I am experiencing excessive noise with this microphone, how can you help me resolve it? The noise-canceling function is OFF by default. To activate noise cancel, press and hold the mute button until it turns blue. What is the maximum length of the microphone arm? It can reach up to 30 inches when fully extended. This allows for greater flexibility and range of motion when positioning the microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Budget-Friendly Audio Clarity Meets User-friendly Functionality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As someone looking for an entry level microphone, the ZealSound Gaming Microphone Kit was a great find. The condenser USB microphone delivers crisp and clear audio, ensuring my voice comes through loud and clear. Its functionality is top-notch, offering a plug-and-play experience that requires no drivers or software, which means that it worked with my Android phone with no problems. The addition of the boom arm is a practical touch, allowing for easy adjustment and optimal positioning. The kit truly combines functionality and practicality, making it an essential piece of equipment for both gaming enthusiasts and budding podcasters.Pros:- High-quality condenser USB microphone for clear audio- Plug-and-play functionality; no need for drivers or software- Adjustable boom arm for optimal microphone positioning- Practical for both gaming and podcastingCons:- Lack of power toggle on the device itself- Included USB to USB-C and Thunderbolt adaptors are poor qualityIn conclusion, this is a valuable product that provides a superior audio experience, with a plug-and-play feature that eliminates the need for additional software or drivers. Its adjustable boom arm is a bonus that enhances practicality and use.TL;DR:The ZealSound Gaming Microphone Kit is a high-quality, easy-to-use product that provides clear audio. Ideal for both gaming and podcasting, this microphone kit is functional, practical, and user-friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: I like it. I used to use tonor and have to say, this is cheaper and much higher quality sound. I’m impressed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the money
reviews.reviewText: The mic is plug and play. Works well with iPhone and computer. It does distort at the higher volume settings so turn it down and it will sound fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beginner friendly and affordable!
reviews.reviewText: I already own another microphone from ZealSound and it was so amazing that I had to get it for my friend since they told me their's recently broke. This microphone is very high quality for such a low price in comparison to other products that start around $100. Though at first, it may seem a little confusing to setup but it is very beginner friendly once you get started. Would recommend to anyone looking for an affordable and high quality microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Customer Service Warranty
reviews.reviewText: Good microphone works good but after a while it had some issues but this guys are amazing and thanks my their warranty i received a new mic from them and it works great. Also the customer care lady Nicole was super helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up. Impressive for its pricepoint
reviews.reviewText: The microphone was easy to set up. The extra pop screen was bought separately. My desk has a barrier that blocks the turn handle on the latch. Not really an issue just be aware of that if you're working in tight spaces. The setup itself is very easy and its nice that it comes with a usb-c adapter and iphone adapter so that you can use it with multiple devices. Once you connect you just go to your audio settings and set the input to the microphone and you are good to go. Very user friendly setup. At higher volumes there is a noticeable echo but that was not helped by the fact I'm operating in a corner space with no sound mitigation. Looking at other reviews though this is a common complaint. This is easily fixed by bringing down the volume of the microphone though and the echo completely goes away. Im writing this review just a couple days after using the product so can never be totally sure about the longevity, however I'm not worried about it because the microphone comes with a lifetime warranty and other reviews regarding their customer service seem to be on point. At the pricepoint it is a solid value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well product with handy accessories
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Comes with an arm stand, type C - USB A and lightning to USB-A adapters. Headphone or earbud is not included as described. Tested on notebook with USB A and an android phone with type C compatible and worked well. On mobile device, you just plug it in and start voice recording or video shooting, the phone would use external microphone right away. The microphone with lightning adapter is not tested on Apple products. It has an "echo" controller on the microphone. Would work pretty well for podcast production. With an arm stand the upper part of the microphone would reach up to 35.82 inches (91 cm) high. In terms of the warranty, it is indicated on the cable "lifetime warranty", but in the pamphlet it is noted "12 months". The weight of the microphone (with foam windscreen) + arm stand + table clamp + main cable (USB A to type C) + USB A to type C adapter makes 26.8 oz. (760 g).

Easy plug and play, comes with the arm, sounds very good for the price. Not as good as a more expensive XLR but gets the job done. The ability to monitor my output and the on the mic mute button are two features I like.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good customer service an really understanding
reviews.reviewText: This company’s customer service is amazing my mic broke after 1 week but the company was very understanding and they gave me a full refund
Good quality for a good price. The mic has very good quality specially you use a soundboard
